rows.label: xs32270100_MSG0100
rows.name: I just couldn't figure it out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32270100_MSG0110
rows.name:
How the Ares could keep running, just as normal,
even though all its cores got torn right out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32270100_MSG0120
rows.name: But it's because of you, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32270100_MSG0130
rows.name: Don't wanna dwell on it, but yeah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32270100_MSG0150
rows.name:
I get the feeling we're a step closer
to solving the great mystery.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32270100_MSG0160
rows.name: Of where in the body the human spirit resides.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32270100_MSG0190
rows.name: The spirit isn't something one human body can contain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32270100_MSG0200
rows.name:
And it's not part of the consciousness packaged
inside a mimeosome, either.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32270100_MSG0210
rows.name:
Other people can reflect someone's way of thinking,
even their way of being...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32270100_MSG0220
rows.name:
which means that a person's spirit can exist
in every other person whose life they touch.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32270100_MSG0230
rows.name: That's how I see it now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32270100_MSG0240
rows.name: No such thing as a soul that exists in isolation, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32270100_MSG0260
rows.name:
Your spirit lives inside everyone who
thinks of you as the hero.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32270100_MSG0280
rows.name:
It exists in everyone...who's been kind enough
to make the effort to get to know me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32270100_MSG0310
rows.name:
The spirit of Lao, who held on to his memories
of me until his very end...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32270100_MSG0320
rows.name: It has to be within me, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32270100_MSG0330
rows.name: If you never came back, I...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32270100_MSG0400
rows.name:
You feel others' spirits,
just the same way that you do your own.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32270100_MSG0410
rows.name: That's all it took, no more,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32270100_MSG0420
rows.name: for you to become Lao's final hope...[ST:wait ]
